description: This easy butter chicken recipe is on the table in 20 minutes. Loaded with chicken and veg for a warming dinner, this is one the whole family will love.
keywords: Indian curry,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Easy Butter Chicken With Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 650g chicken thigh fillets, fat trimmed, cut into 3cm pieces
300g washed & ready to cook vegetable medley

recipeInstructions.text: Place rice and 2 1/4 cups cold water in a medium saucepan. Bring to the boil over high heat. Cover and reduce heat to medium. Cook for 14 minutes. Remove pan from heat and stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Fluff up rice with a fork

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook chicken for 5 minutes, turning, or until golden. Add simmer sauce to pan, reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes or until sauce has thickened slightly and chicken is cooked through.
Pierce vegetable packet with a knife and microwave on high for 90 seconds or until vegetables are tender.
Divide rice, butter chicken and vegetables among bowls. Serve topped with mint.
